reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an excellent professor who makes complex topics easy to understand. Her lectures are engaging, and she is always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is very knowledgeable and passionate about math. Sometimes the pace of the class is a bit fast, but overall a great learning experience.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee knows her material well but can be hard to follow at times. The class is challenging, but if you put in the effort, you can do well.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's lectures are a bit dry, and he tends to stick to the textbook too much. The course could use more interactive elements.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is passionate about literature and encourages deep analysis of texts. Her assignments are tough but fair, and she provides good feedback.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Williams is not very engaging and often seems disorganized. The lectures feel disconnected, and it's hard to follow along.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is fantastic! Her enthusiasm for biology is contagious, and she makes the material accessible and interesting. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is knowledgeable, but his teaching style is very lecture-heavy. If you prefer a more discussion-based class, this might not be for you.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is a great teacher who is always willing to help. Her labs are well-structured, and she explains the concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Prof. Clark's lectures can be hard to follow, and he doesn't always explain the material clearly. The class was a bit disappointing overall.
